data.title: Sandy Martinez Stats & Scouting Report
data.meta_site_name: College Baseball, MLB Draft, Prospects - Baseball America
data.text:
The move to 34 full scholarships from the traditional 11.7 number this offseason will further shake the core of the college game.

Which players have ideal combination of plate skills and impact? Here are 10 prospects to know, including several less-heralded names.

New scouting reports on more than 40 high school baseball prospects in the 2025 and 2026 MLB Draft classes.

With the 2024 transfer cycle all but dying down, here are five winners and five losers in the portal.

How have AL West organizations fared so far across all levels? Geoff Pontes and J.J. Cooper dive into each club.

This week on the Baseball America Fantasy Baseball Podcast, Dylan and Geoff discuss each of their P1 ADP Mocks. Every year Chris Welsh puts together…

Iowa State Rep. and Sioux City Explorers righthander J.D. Scholten tells the incredible story of his improbable return to pro baseball.

The latest Hot Sheet show discusses Zach Dezenzo’s callup, the state of the Astros’ farm system and when we might see Junior Caminero.

With the trade deadline and draft now over, J.J. Cooper and Geoff Pontes dive into the state of every AL East farm system.

Carlos and Peter hop on the podcast to give their first thoughts on the 2024 draft and how things played out.
